did.unittitle: Queens County, N.Y. enslaved people bills of sale
did.abstract: This collection contains bills of sale for the purchase of enslaved people in Queens County, N.Y. from 1751 to 1793, prior to the abolition of slavery in New York State. Three of the six bills of sale document the purchase of enslaved people by the Wyckoff Family of Queens County, as well as John Van Wyck.

acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1978.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains bills of sale for the purchase of enslaved people in Queens County, N.Y. from 1751 to 1793, prior to the abolition of slavery in New York State. Three of the six bills of sale document the purchase of enslaved people by the Wyckoff Family of Queens County, as well as John Van Wyck.
